N-Back Task.Description: The verbal N-Back Task measures working memory ability
N-Back Task.DatasetType: derivitive - summary data produced by code/Nback_WF.py

block.Description: Block number for the task - the number does corresponds to order

n_acc.Description: total accuracy: for correct responses and correct rejections

p_acc.Description: percent accuracy: for correctresponses and correct rejections

n_fill_corr.Description: total correct no-responses to filler/non-target trials

p_fill_corr.Description: percent correct no-responses to filler/non-target trials

n_fill_fa.Description: total incorrect responses (false alarms) to filler/non-target trials

p_fill_fa.Description: percent incorrect responses (false alarms) to filler/non-target trials

p_target_ba.Description: balanced accuracy ((percent hits + percent correct no response)/2)

rt_mean_target_hit.Description: average reaction time across all correct target responses (i.e., hits)

rt_med_target_hit.Description: median reaction time across all correct target responses (i.e., hits)
